concept.description: Creates a relationship HAS_FINDBUGS_BUGINSTANCE between Type labeled nodes and BugInstance labeled nodes with same FQN.
concept.cypher: MATCH (f:FindBugs:BugInstance), (t:Type) WHERE f.className = t.fqn MERGE (t)-[:HAS_FINDBUGS_BUGINSTANCE]->(f) RETURN t.fqn;

concept.description: Creates a relationship HAS_BUG between CLASS labeled nodes and BUGINSTANCE labeled nodes with same FQN.
concept.cypher: MATCH (c:Class), (s:SourceLine)--(b:BugInstance) WHERE c.fqn = s.fqn CREATE UNIQUE (c)-[:HAS_BUG]->(b) RETURN count(c)

constraint.description: Returns the top 10 classes regarding containing number of FindBugs errors
constraint.cypher: MATCH (c)-[:HAS_BUG]->(b) RETURN c.fqn, count(c) AS BugCount ORDER BY BugCount DESC LIMIT 10;
